metadata.title: CVE-2017-7436 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
In libzypp before 20170803 it was possible to retrieve unsigned packages without a warning to the user which could lead to man in the middle or malicious servers to inject malicious RPM packages into a users system.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-7436` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libzypp-bin - 17.6.1-1
libzypp-common - 17.6.1-1
libzypp-config - 17.6.1-1
libzypp1722 - 17.6.1-1
No subscription required

notes.note: sbeattie> likely requires zypper changes, too

criterions.comment: libzypp package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '17.6.1-1').
